attributes.action: Please support the Antwerp Mansion License Application.
attributes.additional_details:
Please support our application for a permanent late night license.

Antwerp Mansion is a venue built, run and frequented by musicians, artists and videographers.

It represents creative freedom and a genuine alternative to mainstream culture.

Antwerp Mansion doesn't take any funding from the council, or grants from any body.  All it requires to ensure it's continued support of the music and local arts is to be granted a late license.

A successful application would create dozens of jobs within the local community and allow us to renovate a historic Victorian Building while providing a safe and unique venue for music and art in Manchester.

It has run for over 4 years with the help of volunteers & donations.

We want the council to recognise the importance of this unique piece of Manchester.

WE NEED YOUR HELP!

Please sign this electronic petition to support our application and support live music and the arts in your community.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
